thread.title: Kristin Kay Pardon
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Kristin Kay Pardon

author: Kristin Kay Pardon
title: Kristin Kay Pardon
text: Buying furniture went great my issue was the delivery got phone call day before delivery said would call morning of delivery to give time frame of deliver we'll never got call I called left message No Return call sat and waited all day finally I called again hour later spoke with person said be here between six and eight was long day and delivery could have been handled better thanks for listening
